text: Lucía Topolansky Saavedra (born September 25, 1944) is a Uruguayan senator. She is the widow of Uruguay's President José Mujica. She was the Vice President of Uruguay from September 2017 to March 2020, after Raúl Fernando Sendic's resignation. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Uruguay Category:Politicians from Montevideo
title: Lucía Topolansky
